description:
Bruce Campbell initially led the Evil Dead film franchise for three installments, followed by a stand-alone 2013 remake, and he later returned for 2015’s series Ash vs Evil Dead. Now, following the success of 2023’s theatrical hit Evil Dead Rise, Bruce Campbell will once again return as Ash for an animated Evil Dead series. While [...]

The post Bruce Campbell To Return As Ash In ‘Evil Dead’ Animated Series appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Bruce Campbell To Return As Ash In ‘Evil Dead’ Animated Series
